content:
Working on setting up devnet 2 with the following images:

```
default_ethereum_client_images:
### Consensus layer clients
  lighthouse: ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable-2792705
  lodestar: ethpandaops/lodestar:peerDAS-cec27d6
  nimbus: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:pdsync-30f8ef9
  prysm: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS-5f896aa
  prysm_validator: gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/validator:latest
  teku: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das-458f7e7
  grandine: ethpandaops/grandine:hangleang-fix-negotiation-timeout-f9abd77
```

Please yell if you want something else.

author: manunlp
content:
There is a known issue where, sometimes, if a data column is not received by a full node, then this full node may not be able to re-join the main fork.
This issue is fixed in [this (not yet merged) PR](https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/14475).
However, I don't want Prysm to delay the devnet.

My question:
==> Once the devnet is launched, will it be possible to update the images?

author: manunlp
content:
Because here the issue is Prysm (at least `prysm-geth-3`, the only I analysed ATM) triggers peers disconnection because it considers its peers have a veryh low gossip score.

Eg:

```
["2024-09-24 15:46:11.43"]  DEBUG p2p: "Initiate peer disconnection" direction=Inbound error="is bad peer no lock: gossip scorer: gossip score below threshold: got -2569.400688 - threshold -100.000000"
multiaddr="/ip4/159.223.6.231/tcp/9000/p2p/16Uiu2HAm5opVzT6qyAVoas6bVJzbuRyvWG7XKSFt9xdYzXoMZmrH" remainingActivePeers=5
["2024-09-24 15:46:11.53"]  DEBUG sync: "Sending goodbye and disconnect" error="is bad peer no lock: gossip scorer: gossip score below threshold: got -4532.661535 - threshold -100.000000" peer=16Uiu2HAmM9HyG13DuZBHpZjQRZjzta4Xu6qex896eT2FqJWyykrj
topic="/eth2/beacon_chain/req/metadata/3/ssz_snappy"
["2024-09-24 15:46:11.53"]  DEBUG sync: "Sending goodbye and disconnect" error="is bad peer no lock: gossip scorer: gossip score below threshold: got -4532.661535 - threshold -100.000000" peer=16Uiu2HAmM9HyG13DuZBHpZjQRZjzta4Xu6qex896eT2FqJWyykrj
topic="/eth2/beacon_chain/req/status/1/ssz_snappy"
["2024-09-24 15:46:11.72"]  DEBUG p2p: "Initiate peer disconnection" direction=Inbound error="is bad peer no lock: gossip scorer: gossip score below threshold: got -4532.661535 - threshold -100.000000"
multiaddr="/ip4/138.197.85.250/tcp/9000/p2p/16Uiu2HAmM9HyG13DuZBHpZjQRZjzta4Xu6qex896eT2FqJWyykrj" remainingActivePeers=5
["2024-09-24 15:46:12.00"]  DEBUG "pool/attestations": "Aggregated unaggregated attestations" duration=1.15141ms
["2024-09-24 15:46:12.56"]  DEBUG sync: "Sending goodbye and disconnect" error="is bad peer no lock: gossip scorer: gossip score below threshold: got -5503.946150 - threshold -100.000000" peer=16Uiu2HAm2SgLBm3tecuXjxU5yDJ9VYN8UHo8p4Tw82YbbbrYiUxZ
topic="/eth2/beacon_chain/req/metadata/3/ssz_snappy"
...
```

It never happen when testing locally with Kurtosis, I have to figure out what's happening.
